FuncDef: The display switchover state all command checks whether an existing device can perform a master board/slave board switchover.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check whether an existing device meets the master board/slave board switchover condition, you can run the display switchover state command.
Precautions
Before running the slave switchover command, run the display switchover state command to check whether an existing device meets the master board/slave board switchover condition. Specifically, check whether Switchover State is ready. If it is not ready, clear the fault first.
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
